successes.title: Lume Cube - Flash & Video Light for GoPro, iPhone & Android
successes.description: The Lume Cube is a revolutionary little light. 1,500 Lumens Powerful in a 1.5"cube. Works with iPhone, Android and GoPro or any Camera

Pledges.description: Pledge $5 bucks to help the cause and we will send you a photo postcard with a photo from one of our personal collections.  You never know what you will get but you know it will be from the heart.  We will also give you a shout out at the end of our official product video on launch.

You will receive a Limited Edition "1 of 222" Lume Cube Blue silicone sleeve that includes a free app to control your Lume Cube remotely. Fire the flash or turn on the constant video light directly from your smartphone. Be one of the first to shed a "little light on life".

You will receive Black Lume Cube with silicone sleeve that includes a free app to control your Lume Cube remotely. Fire the flash or turn on the constant video light directly from your smartphone. Be one of the first to shed a "little light on life".
The JOBY Micro Tripod Kit. Receive a JOBY® Micro Tripod with (1) Lume Cube. With the ball mount you can ensure your Lume Cube is facing in the right direction when you most need it.

The Cold Shoe Kit.  For all you photographers that have asked about a camera flash mount, we've made it happen!  You will receive (1) black Lume Cube and (1) Ball Head Cold Shoe Mount.  Simply put the Lume Cube on the 1/4 20 and slide the ball head mount into the flash mount on your camera.  Once mounted, easily adjust or angle the light where you want it.
The Dual Kit.  You will receive (2) Black Lume Cubes, a total of 3000 lumens of light, for your nighttime photography or video.

Customize your Cube!  You will receive (2) fully functional black Lume Cubes and an assortment of (4) colored skins with suction and magnet mount.  Each skin will be a different color:  Red, Green, Orange, Yellow.  Simply remove your current skin and change the color.
The "Kit and Kaboodle" includes a variety of accessories to get you out and shooting with your Lume Cube.

1 Black Lume Cube 
1 JOBY® Micro Tripod 
2 Additional Skins (Red and Bone Grey) 
1 Waterproof Case 
1 Cold Shoe Mount

GoPro’s Hero® camera dual kit - The Lume Cube is made to be used with GoPro’s Hero® camera. This reward gets you set up to shoot some lo-light video with your GoPro Hero®. Kit includes 2 Lume Cubes, GoPro Hero® Connector / Mount, 2 waterproof cases good to 100ft. The mount holds 2 lights producing 3,000 lumens of light.
You asked for a kit with all the accessories...we bring you the "Whole Enchilada".  Backers will receive an assortment of gear to outfit your Lume Cubes.

2 Black Lume Cubes 
2 JOBY® Micro Tripods
4 Additional Skins (2 Red & 2 Bone Grey)
1 Mounting Bar made to be used with GoPro’s Hero® camera.
2 Waterproof Cases
1 Cold Shoe Mount
Quad Kit - Includes 4 Lume Cubes producing an eye burning 6,000 lumens of light. Use these little power houses to light up an entire scene when shooting with your iPhone / Android.
The 5 Pack.  Get Connected.  Push your creative ability to the limit with 5 Black Lume Cubes. Sync them all simultaneously with the free app to set the scene just right.

GoPro’s Hero® Camera quad kit - The Lume Cube is made to be used with GoPro’s Hero® camera. This reward gets you set up to shoot some lo-light video with your GoPro Hero®. Kit includes 4 Lume Cubes, GoPro Hero® Connector / Mount. The mount holds 4 lights producing 6,000 lumens of light.

Be one of the first dealers to offer Lume Cubes with our exclusive Dealer Kit.  Kit Includes: 
(7)Black Lume Cubes, (3) Red Lume Cubes, (2) GoPro Dual Kits, 1 - GoPro Quad Kit
1 - Lume Cube Marketing Packet
